name: Singleless
description:
Singleless is a  2.5D top-down 2-player competitive shooting game.

It takes ~3 minutes to finish one round.

Please follow the in-game tutorial from the title screen.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Singleless was made by Xiangyu "Marshall" Wang and Zichang Liu in Richard Lemarchand and Peter Brinson's Interactive Design and Production class at USC in Spring 2020.

Music is by Matt Miller. Find his work here.

Art style is by Xin Ye. Find her work here.

Full credits are below.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
